description.name: Cable Cutter 32 Inch
description.long_desc:
Cable cutter for use with Copper & Aluminum electrical wire only.


Product Features



  • Maximum shear capacity: 400 mm²

  • Forged and hardened steel jaws

  • Parrot-beak jaws prevent cable slippage

  • For copper and aluminium cable

  • Replaceable blades

  • Rubber grips

  • Product Length: 32" / 800 mm


Technical Data



  • Full Lenght: 32" / 800 mm

  • Head Width: 90 mm

  • Opening Length: 75 mm

  • Maximum Shear Capacity: 400 mm²

description.name: Ratchet Crimping Pliers 9"
description.long_desc:
Heavy duty Ratchet Crimping Pliers suitable for insulated terminals.


Product Features



  • Crimping Range: 0,5 - 6,0 mm²

  • Crimps terminals: 0.5 - 1 mm2 - Red; 1.5 - 2.5 mm2 Blue; 2.6 - 6 mm2 Yellow

  • Pre-set tension for accurate crimping

  • Hardened steel jaws

  • Moulded grip handles

description.name: Wire Stipper/Crimper 8" 0,5-5 mm2
description.long_desc:
Wire Stripping Tool used predominately for uninsulated terminals including ignition terminals. The product has multiple uses including wire stripping and cutting.


Product Features



  • Crimping Range: 0,5 - 5,0 mm²

  • Stripping wire capacity: 0,5 - 5,0 mm²

  • Cutting bolts and screws: M2.6, M3, M3.5, M4, M5

  • Carbon steel hardened, tempered and chemically blacked jaws

  • Moulded grip handles

description.name: Self-adjustable Crimping Tools 0,25-10mm2
description.long_desc:
Self-adjusting crimping pliers for conductor end-sleeves.


Product Features



  • Quadrangle crimping

  • Self adjust to the desired ferrule size

  • Self-releasing mechanism

  • For wire and ferrules: 0,25 - 10 mm²

  • Adjustable ratchet for pressure control


Technical Data



  • Crimping capacity: 0.5-16mm2

  • AWG: 23-7

  • Coated plastic handle

  • Total Length: 175 mm

description.name: Automatic Wire Stripping Tool 0,2-6mm2
description.long_desc:
Multi-functional self-adjusting wire stripper for the electrical and automotive enthusiast. Ideal for stripping. cutting and crimping wires.


Product Features



  • High quality Cr12MoV steel jaws

  • Adjustable stripper length and power

  • Cuts and strips solid or standard copper and aluminium wire 0.2-6mm2 (10-24AWG)

  • Crimps insulated terminals: 22-10 AWG (0.5-6mm²)

  • Crimp non-insulated terminals: 12-10 AWG (4-6mm²) / 16-14 AWG (1.5-2.5mm²) / 22-18 AWG (4-6mm²)

  • Crimp auto ignition terminals: 7-8mm

  • Ergonomic and comfortable grip made of PP+TPR
description.short_desc:
Multi-functional self-adjusting wire stripper for the electrical and automotive enthusiast. Ideal for stripping. cutting and crimping wires.


Product Features



  • High quality Cr12MoV steel jaws

  • Adjustable stripper length and power

  • Cuts and strips solid or standard copper and aluminium wire 0.2-6mm2 (10-24AWG)

  • Crimps insulated terminals: 22-10 AWG (0.5-6mm²)

  • Crimp non-insulated terminals: 12-10 AWG (4-6mm²) / 16-14 AWG (1.5-2.5mm²) / 22-18 AWG (4-6mm²)

  • Crimp auto ignition terminals: 7-8mm

  • Ergonomic and comfortable grip made of PP+TPR
description.description:

description.name: Hollow punch pin set 6pcs/set(1/8"-5/16")
description.long_desc:
Set of leather punches 6 pcs. 2.8 - 8mm


Leather punch set 6pcs. The punches are made of high-quality tool steel.


Product Features:


made of high-quality materials
set includes 6 punches in size 2.8 - 8 mm
intended for leather, rubber, cardboard

Material: Steel
Number of elements: 6
Punch sizes: 2.8mm(1/8"); 3.7mm(5/32"); 4.6mm(3/16"); 5.7mm(7/32"); 7mm(1/4"); 8mm(5/16")

description.name: Utility knife 100x18x0.5mm type nr. 1
description.long_desc:
p>Wallpaper cutter with rubberized handle and snap-off blade 18mm


Universal cutter with an 18mm snap-off blade.


The cutter is made of plastic, the profiled handle is covered with non-slip rubber.


Product features:
carbon steel blade 
extendable, snap-off blade
profiled, non-slip handle



Technical Specifications:
Application: ideal for any wallpapering job as well as cutting cardboard, tapes, cables, paneling
Tool length: 165 mm
Blade width: 18 mm
Blade material: carbon steel
Additional information: snap-off blade blade

description.name: Utility knife with 5 blades
description.long_desc:
Noyk do tapet z magazynkiem aluminiowy gumowany ostrze trapezowe 19mm + 5 ostrzy

N uniwersalnego zastosowania w ostrze trapezowe 19mm.
Noyk wykonany z aluminium, rkoje wyprofilowana pokryta antypolizgow guma.
Noyk wyposaony w magazynek na ostrza. Po zuyciu jednego ostrza i cofniciu prowadnicy kolejne ostrze adowane jest automatycznie.

Charakterystyka produktu:

  • aluminiowy korpus
  • wysuwane ostrze
  • wyprofilowana, antypolizgowa rkoje
  • magazynek na ostrza z podajnikiem

Specyfikacja techniczna:

  • Zastosowanie: do cicia tapet, kartonw, tam, kabli, wykadzin
  • Dugo narzdzia: 175 mm
  • Szeroko ostrza: 19 mm
  • Materia wykonania ostrza: stal wglowa
  • Ilo ostrzy: 5
  • Informacje dodatkowe: ostrze dwustronne trapezowe, magazynek na ostrza
description.short_desc:
